snippet: Sun Media Group is joining Harvest Fund Management to create Harvest Seven Stars Media Private Equity, which will back entertainment ventures in China and abroad.
abstract: Sun Media Group is joining Harvest Fund Management to create Harvest Seven Stars Media Private Equity, an $800 million fund which will back entertainment ventures in China and abroad.
lead_paragraph: Sun Media Group is joining Harvest Fund Management to create Harvest Seven Stars Media Private Equity, which will back entertainment ventures in China and abroad.

headline.seo: $800 Million Chinese Fund to Back Film Projects
headline.main: China Fund to Support Film Projects Worldwide
headline.print_headline: China Fund To Support Film Projects Worldwide
